name: Crusher Stack: Jump up 3D Ball
description:
Crusher Stack - Jump up Ball 3D Block Puzzle game.
Don’t miss out on 3D Stack, fun and free to play puzzle games. Easy to pick up but hard to let go of once you experience its relaxing and addictive zen vibe.
Place block to create and clear full vertically and horizontally lines on the game board in an infinite race for a better High Score.
Keep your time.
Stay focused as blocks start to stack up and place blocks strategically.
The difficulty over time ramps up with more layered pieces.

How to play?
● Tap to drop a block.
● Stack blocks up and construct a tower.
● Stacking blocks
● Start each level.
● Throw the Ball on Blocks to destroy it!
● Make the tower craft & crush them.

Feeling bored and looking for simple boredom killer games?
Welcome to stack blocks a stacking game that requires sharp thinking and reflex skills, as well as perfect timing.
How to make highest scores in this kind of stacking game?
To increase your scores early you just need to put the block on block the more you do that the more scores you earn. Because putting a block on the previous block at the same position start multiplying your scores. And multiplier never stops until you miss the previous block's position.

Game Featured:
- Calming and pretty with simple gameplay.
- It's nice to play when you want to calm your mind before bed.
- Colorful blocks.
- Beautiful graphics.
- Simple one-touch gameplay.
- Easy to learn.
- Suitable for all ages.
- Trains reflexes and focus.
- Simple tap controls

Crusher Stack will make you nostalgic of the childhood memories when you use to play with block to make a tower building. The game lets you relive that moment. Build tall buildings to make the city look very colorful. Its all about the hand and mind coordination. Lets test your motor skills with this hyper causal game. You might find it hard in the start. Practice is what makes you a pro in this game. Dare to give it a try?

So, what are you waiting for? Just install this most addicting stacking game and start playing. Remember you have a very long stacking game journey to complete and if you lose your focus, your stack block gets shorter instantly. Although you don’t have to worry very much because it’s a very simple stack-building game.
Compete and show off your skills for the top spot on the leaderboard.
Challenge yourself and beat your friend's Scores. The Best Block Puzzle game. Stack color blocks & Jump up with 3D Ball.
